snippet: Jake Peavy pitched effectively into the seventh and Dayan Viciedo homered and made a key catch as the Chicago White Sox defeated the Detroit Tigers in their home opener.
abstract: Baseball Roundup; Chicago White Sox defeat Detroit Tigers, 5-2, in their home opener; other MLB scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Jake Peavy pitched effectively into the seventh and Dayan Viciedo homered and made a key catch as the Chicago White Sox defeated the Detroit Tigers in their home opener.

headline.seo: Peavy Provides Lift as White Sox Win; Cubs Top Cardinals
headline.main: Peavy Provides Lift as White Sox Win; Cubs Top Cards
headline.print_headline: Peavy Provides Lift As White Sox Win; Cubs Top Cardinals
